item.title: 现场直播：富时 100 指数将在股市大反弹中上涨
苹果公司库克访华期间誓言促进中国投资
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在访问世界第二大经济体中国时承诺，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对中国的外国制造产品征收关税，但苹果公司仍将加大对中国的投资。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook pledged to boost investment in China during a visit to the world’s second largest economy, despite threats from US President Donald Trump to slap tariffs on its foreign-made products.】

item.title: 人工智能军备竞赛推动需求增长，ASML订单超预期
item.description: ASML Holding NV 公司第三季度的订单超过了分析师的预期，因为数千亿美元的人工智能基础设施投资推动了对其芯片制造设备的需求。【原文：ASML Holding NV’s orders beat analyst expectations in the third quarter, as demand for its chip-making machines was fueled by hundreds of billions of dollars in investment into artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 泰国向当地人提供刺激以振兴旅游业
item.description: 阿努廷-查维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）总理领导的政府正计划刺激国内旅游业，以提振受美国关税和外国游客人数下滑打击的经济。【原文：Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s government is planning stimulus for domestic tourism to lift an economy hit by US tariffs and slumping foreign arrivals.】

item.title: 印度卢比因美国贸易希望而从历史最低点边缘飙升回来
item.description: 在与美国达成贸易协议的希望下，印度卢比从接近历史最低点反弹，创下近四个月来的最大涨幅。【原文：The Indian rupee gained the most in nearly four months, rebounding from near a record low, on hopes of a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 世界顶级电力交易所 EEX 计划扩大在日本中部的业务
item.description: 全球最大的电力交易所欧洲能源交易所股份公司（European Energy Exchange AG）的目标是在年底前为其提供的产品中再增加一个日本地区，从而增强其在迅速扩大的市场中的影响力。【原文：The European Energy Exchange AG, the world’s biggest electricity bourse, aims to add another Japanese region to its product offerings by year-end, boosting its presence in a rapidly expanding market.】

item.title: 新加坡房屋销售在淡季放缓
item.description: 由于开发商在传统的淡季推迟了大型项目的发布，新加坡 9 月份的新私宅销售量有所下降。【原文：Singapore’s new private home sales fell in September as developers held back on major project releases during a traditionally quiet period.】

item.title: 中国想要什么？为时尚早
item.description:
无论是强势还是弱势，北京队的时机把握都非常好。【原文：

Whether playing from a position of strength or weakness, Beijing’s timing is excellent.

】

item.title: 巴基斯坦获得国际货币基金组织 12 亿美元贷款的初步批准
item.description: 巴基斯坦已与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）达成初步协议，将在两个独立项目下释放 12 亿美元贷款。【原文：Pakistan has reached a preliminary agreement with the International Monetary Fund, to unlock $1.2 billion of loans under two separate programs.】

item.title: 苹果家庭集线器赌注和贸易繁荣助推越南经济持续火爆
item.description: 从在解放日被征收惩罚性关税，到被全球最大的科技公司之一选中制造下一代智能家居设备，越南正在迎来一个新的时刻。【原文：From being hit with punitive tariffs on Liberation Day to being selected by one of the world’s biggest tech companies to build its next generation of smart home devices, Vietnam is having a moment.】

item.title: 日本意外的造王者玉木有望成为下任首相
item.description: 不到一年前，玉木雄一郎还在为保住自己所在反对党的领导权而奋斗，因为有报道称他有婚外情。现在，这位 56 岁的田径迷已成为国家领导人的候选人，下届政府的归属基本在他的掌握之中。【原文：Less than a year ago, Yuichiro Tamaki was fighting to retain the leadership of his own opposition party amid reports of an extramarital affair. Now, the 56-year-old athletics fan is in the running to lead the nation, with the identity of the next administration largely in his grasp.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马克鲁夫称通胀率超过 2% 比低于该阈值风险更大
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）驳斥了人们对通胀率跌破2%目标的担忧，他说，实际上他更担心通胀率会高于这一门槛。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf dismissed concerns about inflation dropping below the 2% target, saying he’s actually more worried that it will come in above that threshold.】

item.title: 民调显示瑞士对超级富豪征收遗产税未获支持
item.description: 瑞士选民看来将否决针对超级富豪的新遗产税，因为该提案引发了人们对富人可能离开瑞士的担忧。【原文：Swiss voters look set to reject a new inheritance tax targeted at the super rich after the proposal triggered concerns that wealthy individuals could leave the country.】

item.title: 美国制裁后，油轮从中国日照港转航
item.description: 日照港的石油吞吐量约占中国石油进口量的十分之一，在美国对日照港实施制裁后，三艘驶往日照港的超级油轮目前正在寻找其他泊位。【原文：Three supertankers that were headed for Rizhao port are now looking for alternative berths, following US sanctions on the terminal that handles around a 10th of China’s oil imports.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期国债销售需求低于 12 个月平均水平
item.description: 由于较高的收益率吸引了投资者，日本自执政政治联盟瓦解以来首次出售政府债券，吸引了比 12 个月平均水平更强劲的需求。【原文：Japan’s first sale of government bonds since the ruling political coalition crumbled drew demand that was stronger than the 12-month average as higher yields attracted investors.】

item.title: 印度将收紧绿色电力规则以保障电网稳定
item.description: 印度计划收紧可再生能源规则以保护电网稳定，要求太阳能和风能生产商更严格地遵守供应计划，否则将面临处罚和收入损失。【原文：India plans to tighten rules on renewable energy to protect its grid stability, requiring solar and wind power producers to stick more closely to their supply schedules or face penalties and loss of revenue.】

item.title: Coinbase 投资印度 CoinDCX，估值 24.5 亿美元
item.description: Coinbase Global 已经投资了总部位于孟买的 CoinDCX，该交易所运营商正努力深化其在印度和中东地区的业务。【原文：Coinbase Global has invested in Mumbai-based CoinDCX as the exchange operator seeks to deepen its exposure to India and the Middle East.】

item.title: 印度股市可能因美联储降息希望带动亚洲市场反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts, we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: KKR 和 PAG 接近以超过 26 亿美元的价格收购札幌房地产公司
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.和 PAG 的联合竞标已成为收购啤酒制造商札幌控股有限公司（Sapporo Holdings Ltd.）房地产控股权的主要候选者，交易价值超过 4000 亿日元（约合 26 亿美元）。【原文：A joint bid from KKR & Co. and PAG has emerged as the leading candidate to buy the real estate holdings of beermaker Sapporo Holdings Ltd. in a deal worth over ¥400 billion ($2.6 billion), according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行据说将恢复外汇掉期以帮助流动性
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行已开始新一轮外汇掉期交易，以支撑流动性，因为最近的货币干预措施导致银行系统现金流失。【原文：India’s central bank has started a fresh round of foreign exchange swaps that shore up liquidity, according to people familiar with the development, as its recent currency interventions drain cash from the banking system.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 CBA 公司表示科曼将再担任三年首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）主席保罗-奥马利（Paul O'Malley）表示，他有意让首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）继续担任这家澳大利亚最大银行的老板，至少到 2028 年。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia Chair Paul O’Malley signaled his intention for Chief Executive Officer Matt Comyn to remain as boss of the country’s biggest lender until at least 2028.】

item.title: 中国九月份通货紧缩有所缓解，但物价跌势依然存在
item.description: 中国的通货紧缩在 9 月份有所缓解，使中国有望出现自 20 世纪 70 年代末市场改革以来最长的经济范围内的价格连续下跌。【原文：China’s deflation eased in September, leaving the country on track for the longest streak of economy-wide price declines since market reforms in the late 1970s.】

item.title: 中国在贸易紧张局势中加强人民币防卫
item.description: 在与美国贸易关系日益紧张的背景下，中国周三通过每日参考汇率加强了货币防御。【原文：China boosted its currency defense on Wednesday via the daily reference rate amid mounting trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 特朗普与中国食用油结怨时，食用油销量已在下降
item.description: 早在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将中国出口到美国的废食用油作为他与中国政府贸易战的最新热点之前，中国出口到美国的废食用油就已经在减少。【原文：Chinese exports of used cooking oil to the US were already in retreat well before President Donald Trump chose them as the latest flashpoint in his trade war with Beijing.】

item.title: 韩国出台新政策抑制炙手可热的房地产市场
item.description: 韩国推出了新一轮措施，旨在控制红火的房地产市场，加大力度抑制投机性购房，因为政策制定者正在权衡降息，以支持放缓的经济。【原文：South Korea rolled out a new round of measures aimed at reining in a red-hot housing market, stepping up efforts to curb speculative buying as policymakers weigh interest-rate cuts to bolster a slowing economy.】

item.title: 州立农场在伊利诺伊州房屋保险费调查中被起诉
item.description: 伊利诺伊州起诉州立农场火灾与伤亡保险公司，迫使其提供信息，以便对该公司快速上涨的房主保费进行调查。【原文：Illinois sued State Farm Fire and Casualty Insurance Co. to force it to provide information for an investigation into the company’s rapidly rising premiums for homeowners.】

item.title: 阿根廷称美国财政部将继续支持比索
item.description: 经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）表示，无论南美国家本月晚些时候的中期选举结果如何，美国仍将致力于与阿根廷保持 200 亿美元的货币互换额度。【原文：Economy Minister Luis Caputo said the US remains committed to a $20 billion currency-swap line with Argentina, regardless of the outcome of midterm elections in the South American nation later this month.】

item.title: 富裕王朝为普吉岛罕见的游艇码头筹资 1 亿美元
item.description: 一个多世纪以来，纳-拉农（Na-Ranong）家族一直与普吉岛的经济增长密切相关，早先以锡矿开采为起点，推动了普吉岛的经济发展，后来又转向开发豪华度假村。【原文：The Na-Ranong family has been closely linked to Phuket’s economic growth for more than a century, starting with tin mining that powered the island’s economy in earlier times before pivoting to develop luxury resorts.】

item.title: 孤星公司收购塑料零件制造商希伦布兰德的交易即将达成
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Lone Star Funds 正在就收购塑料零件和设备制造商 Hillenbrand Inc.【原文：Lone Star Funds is in advanced talks to acquire plastic parts and equipment maker Hillenbrand Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 苹果将在越南制造带屏幕和桌面机器人的 HomePod
item.description: 苹果公司正准备扩大其在越南的制造业务，这是苹果公司进军智能家居市场的一部分，也是苹果公司为减少对中国的依赖而做出的持续努力。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing to expand its manufacturing operations in Vietnam as part of a push into the smart home market and an ongoing effort to lessen its dependence on China.】
